law.catch_line: A person may not knowingly affect or knowingly attempt to affect the payment of compensation, fees, ...

text.section: A person may not knowingly affect or knowingly attempt to affect the payment of compensation, fees, or expenses under this title by means of a fraudulent representation.

A person who violates this section, on conviction:
is subject to the penalties of § 7-104 of the Criminal Law Article; and
may not receive compensation, fees, or expenses under this title.
